CNN: Five things “about” Jesus.
The Rev. James Martin dismisses some of the sensationalist material on Jesus. As for the rest, he raises questions he cannot answer. Apparently he also does not tackle them in his own book. No books were recommended, and the questions will leave many filled with doubts.
